name: Viral Loop
description:
Play as a Lil-Box Virus making its way through a program.

Made for Ludum Dare 47! - Theme Stuck in a loop

WASD to move SPACE to jump

E to respawn and Q to shrink,

When you respawn a copy of your body is left behind that you can use to scale obstacles and the world!

This one almost beat me but i didn't give up on the idea, I think next time im going to avoid 3d Platformers!

Textures from https://www.textures.com/

Backing music is from https://www.youtube.com/user/ApproachingNirvana

license information http://approachingnirvana.com/license
(Check them out theyre amazing)

Enjoy! any feedback is good feedback. I wanted to change idea mid-jam but decided to stick it out and polish the mechanics, hence the abrupt end! Might continue this idea... but i always say that
